glosses: thematic consonant for the words that have one syllable and ending with vowel sound (su is an irregular word)

examples.text: onu, ona, bunu, buna, şunu, şuna, onda, bunda, şunda, ondan, bundan, şundan
examples.translation: that (accusative), this (accusative), to/at/on/in/from this/that, it (accusative)/her/him, to/at/on/in/from it/her/him

glosses: Thematic consonant between the third person possessive suffix -i and case endings.
